definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: It is also impolite to have your elbows on the dining table when you are eating.
sentences.chinese: 而且在用餐時把手肘放在餐桌上是不禮貌的行爲。

sentences.english: Ms Mastenbroek said that behind your elbows and knees are also great points for perfume.
sentences.chinese: 馬斯滕布魯克女士表示，手肘和膝蓋也是不錯的位置。

sentences.english: Use gentle pressure with elbows to release latch.
sentences.chinese: 用手肘部輕壓就可打開門閂。

sentences.english: He had his left leg and elbow wounded and soaked with water during the activity.
sentences.chinese: 他在進行活動期間腳部及手肘曾有傷口，並有澗水。

sentences.english: Bashed him with my elbow after that until he fell through my arms into a heap at my feet.
sentences.chinese: 接着用我的手肘猛擊他直到他癱軟在我的腳下。

sentences.english: He'll guide you by putting his arm on your elbow or in the small of your back.
sentences.chinese: 他會用將手放在你手肘或者你的背部爲你開路。

sentences.english: On the exhale bend your elbows and lower your chest onto your thighs.
sentences.chinese: 呼氣時曲手肘，胸部向下放於大腿上。

sentences.english: He propped his elbow on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 他把手肘支撐在枕頭上。

sentences.english: He gave his elbow a wrench when he fell off the ladder.
sentences.chinese: 他從梯子上摔下時扭傷了手肘。

sentences.english: In many parts South of the border, the elbow is linked to stinginess.
sentences.chinese: 在墨西哥的許多地方，手肘意味着吝嗇。

sentences.english: Your arms should be at a 90 degree angle, with your elbows at yoursides.
sentences.chinese: 你的手臂應該保持90度，手肘在你的兩側。

sentences.english: Use gentle pressure with elbows to latch.
sentences.chinese: 用手肘部輕壓就可打開門閂。

sentences.english: Apply a small amount of the product at lower position inside the elbow or behind the ear.
sentences.chinese: 塗抹少量保養品於手肘下方內側，或耳背後。

sentences.english: The correct rib layout allows the dog's elbows to move freely when the dog trots.
sentences.chinese: 當狗小跑時，正確肋骨佈局允許狗的手肘自由地移動。

sentences.english: Three or four days later, another operation will take place to treat his elbow fracture.
sentences.chinese: 三四天後在進行手術治療手肘骨折。

sentences.english: It's bad enough that your elbows are dry and itchy, but they look terrible too.
sentences.chinese: 手肘乾燥發癢已經夠糟糕了，更重要的還有礙觀瞻。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
